-- Master Key creation
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Pass123';
GO

-- Scoped Credential
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = 'sv=2020-02-10&st=2021-09-22T16%3A24%3A14Z&se=2040-12-03T17%3A24%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=rle&sig=Vqbw3hSTgbwc2P7wOhVQmLVItiqsxckCaBGm1evKws0%3D'
GO

-- If scoped credential is needed
-- ALTER DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand] WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
-- SECRET = 'sv=2020-02-10&st=2021-09-22T16%3A24%3A14Z&se=2040-12-03T17%3A24%3A00Z&sr=c&sp=rle&sig=Vqbw3hSTgbwc2P7wOhVQmLVItiqsxckCaBGm1evKws0%3D'
-- GO



-- External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://thevaultgen2.blob.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = sqlondemand
);

-- External File Format
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVInternalDemo
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
    )
)

-- Create External Table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Contoso_EXT (
   Location_ID VARCHAR(10),
   Ind_Location VARCHAR(50),
   C1 VARCHAR(10),
   C2 VARCHAR(10),
   C3 VARCHAR(10)

)
WITH (
    LOCATION='/csv/internalDemo.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE=SqlOnDemandDemo,
    FILE_FORMAT=CSVInternalDemo
);

Select * From dbo.Contoso_EXT


-- Reset Demo --
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Contoso_EXT
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CSVInternalDemo
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SqlOnDemandDemo 
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [sqlondemand] 


GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::[sqlondemand] TO [FranmerPurview];
